titleInfo.title: Morris Eber posed in Eber's Grocery Store

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''# 195 Eber's Grocery info from back inside''. Handwritten note found inside original envelope: ''#195 Eber's Grocery 1463 Platte St. 1912 Donor Mrs. Graham Susman''. On bottom of photograph: ''1912''.

mods.abstract: Morris Eber wears a work apron and stands in the center of the floor of Eber's Grocery Store located at 1463 Platte Street in Denver in 1912. Groceries and dry goods are on the shelves surrounding him.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 43.
Donated by Mrs. Graham (Eber) Susman ; gift ; 1970-1979? Donated by Mrs. Ben Bockla in 1977.
